* xmlrpc-c-0.9.9.tar.gz
XML-RPC library for C/C++, see "Setup, Installation" in manual.

** patch_xmlrpc-c-0.9.9
Patch file for xmlrpc-c-0.9.9.tar.gz, see "Setup, Installation" in manual.

* xerces-c-current.tar.gz
Xerces XML Library, see "Setup, Installation" in manual.

* Frontier-RPC-0.07b4.tar.gz
An XML-RPC library for perl.
It is used for tests of the XML-RPC Archive Data Server,
including the ArchiveDataClient.pl test script.
Under RedHat 9.0 and Mandrake 10, is was sufficient to install
Frontier-RPC-0.07b4.
Under RedHat 6.2, it was hopeless because many depent perl packages
were missing.

* XML-Simple-2.09.tar.gz
An XML reader for perl, used by the ArchiveDaemon.
See "Setup, Installation" in manual.
